Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the die objects
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jared Weyer
    See Also:
    Die

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> dup
      how many duplicate values in the hand ie, how many 1's 2's 3's...
      private java.util.ArrayList<Die> hand
      contains the die objects
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> handVals
      contains the value of the up side of the die
      private int numDice
      the number of die in the hand
      private int numSides
      how many sides does the die have and how many die are in hand
      private java.lang.String userStr
      Contains the user input string which determines which die in the hand should be rolled
